item.title: Notes on learning Pandas
item.description:
For transperanty sake - those are my notes while learning about pandas from this tutorial. At times this here is just copy paste from it, at other it’s my own thoughts and explanations. This is meant to be a condensed version of the tutorial more or less just for me. If you found it useful though….well, good ofor you, I guess.
Abstract Basic pandas is a Python package providing fast, flexible, and expressive data structures designed to make working with “relationaHeterogeneous datal” or “labeled” data both easy and intuitive.
